original_title: เพราะรัก..จึงจากลา
overview: The story of love and bound of high school students. Chai is beach volleyball player who face the grave danger in his life. Aek is shining player of football team. Competition in sport game with a stake of honor. A love matter which he have to win it. Love is a great thing which will be impressed on their hearts.
title: Feel Good To Say Goodbye
